title: Top Places to visit in Bhilwara, Rajasthan
content:
Bhilwara District is a district of the state of Rajasthan in western India. The town of Bhilwara is the district headquarters.
Bhilwara is a town in the Mewar region of Rajasthan, India. It is famous for textiles in the Indian state of Rajasthan.
